name: Tutorial
description: A basic guide on how to play a Modded Skyblock.

quests.name: Sievery Mastery
quests.description: Sieving different blocks result in different results. Even using different meshes will result in different items too!

tasks.longDescription: Sieving Sand with a String Mesh can result in this exclusive item.
Sieving Gravel with a Flint Stiffened Mesh will result in these exclusive items.
Sieving Dust with an Iron Stiffened Mesh will result in these exclusive items.
Finally, sieving Gravel in an Iron Stiffened Mesh will result in some precious gems.

quests.name: Out to Dry
quests.description: Suntanning for sundries.

tasks.longDescription: Dry out 10 Rotten Flesh and 10 Silkworms, using a Drying Rack.

quests.name: Hammered
quests.description: Yeah man.

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Wooden Hammer.

quests.name: Very Crooked
quests.description: Very concentrated evil!

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Compressed Crook.

quests.name: Clay Vessels
quests.description: Clay is the cornerstone to all new innovation in this world.

tasks.longDescription: Craft an Unfired Crucible and an Unfired Clay Bucket.

quests.name: Free Labor
quests.description: If a machine can do something, you shouldn't have to.

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Cobblestone Generator. Put a Chest on it, and it'll automatically pump out all the Cobblestone you'll ever need.

quests.name: Ore Collector
quests.description: Finally, it's time to get some metals.

tasks.longDescription: Sieve Gravel through at least a Flint Stiffened Mesh to get ore pieces. You'll need 4 Ore Pieces for every Ingot you want to make.
Convert to Ore Chunks!

quests.name: Quest Book Tutorial III
quests.description: The Crafting Task needs you to craft the specified amount of items while the quest is available.

quests.name: Get Fired
quests.description: Things are starting to heat up in here.

tasks.longDescription: Cook the unfired clay items in a Furnace; this will make them usable. Look out! The Clay Buckets will break after being used to transport hot liquids.

quests.name: Ingot Melt
quests.description: And with that, you'll have metal.

tasks.longDescription: Smelt all your chunks to get some ingots.

quests.name: Boiling Point
quests.description: Only one more step away from unlimited Cobblestone.

tasks.longDescription: When set up correctly, fill the Crucible with 4 Cobblestone. When finished, you can remove it with a bucket.

quests.name: Heavy Elements
quests.description: The Heavy Sieve allows you to sift Compressed blocks, like Compressed Dirt.

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Heavy Sieve.

quests.name: Going Nuclear
quests.description: With this, the finest-grain sieve and the finest-grain block, you can get Yellorium.

tasks.longDescription: Sieve Dust in a Diamond Stiffened Mesh to get Yellorium Ore Pieces.
Craft them into Yellorium Ore Chunks.
Finally, cook these to get Yellorium Ingots.

quests.name: Very Hammered
quests.description: Oh my.

tasks.longDescription: A Compressed Hammer allows you to break down a Compressed Block and get the nine blocks you would get if you broke the contents of the compressed block normally.

quests.name: Stiffer Than Ever
quests.description: Creating an Iron Stiffened Mesh will allow you to get even finer materials from Dust.

tasks.longDescription: Craft an Iron Stiffened Sieve.

quests.name: Sieving Away
quests.description: Get used to this fun activity!

tasks.longDescription: Create a String Mesh and a Sieve.
Use the Sieve to break down Dirt into Pebbles. Four Pebbles will get you one Cobblestone.

quests.name: Vitrification
quests.description: This part of the sky has no weather patterns, so we're going to have to fill your barrels a way other than with rainwater.

tasks.longDescription: Place Sand on a Drying Rack. After 45 seconds, it'll turn to Glass.
Use the Glass to get some Bottles. Fill up the Bottles in the lake on the island. Then, you can right click on a Barrel to fill it with Water.

quests.name: Cobbled Up
quests.description: Now it's simple: Create a Cobblestone Generator using any shape or method you want, and bask in the glory of an infinite supply of Cobblestone.

tasks.longDescription: Feed the void!

quests.name: Skeleton Hunter
quests.description: To get Porcelain Clay, you'll need Bone Meal.

tasks.longDescription: Create some kind of dark room that allows you to kill Skeletons. You'll need 7 Bone Meal to get a Crucible.

quests.name: Quest Book Tutorial I
quests.description: This series of quests will provide you with a basic tutorial on how to operate the Quest Book. The first is a Detection Task. You simply have to have the item in your inventory for the quest to complete.

quests.name: Heating Up
quests.description: You'll find further progression impossible without a Furnace; The Sun can't cook all materials to the required temperatures.

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Furnace.
Charcoal is a good, cheap way to get fuel for your Furnaces fast.

quests.name: From Nothing
quests.description: Good morning! Time to start your adventure!

tasks.longDescription: I'd chop down this tree now. Save you time and space. If I may, I'll also advise you use slabs to build, as monsters cannot spawn and it uses half as much wood.

quests.name: Smashing
quests.description: YEAH, MAN!

tasks.longDescription: Break Cobblestone with a Hammer, and you get Gravel. Repeat, and you will get Sand. Repeat once more, and you'll get Dust.

quests.name: Quest Book Tutorial II
quests.description: The next is a Consume Task. You must submit the specified amount of items, either through the Quest Book, or through the QDS.

quests.name: Casting
quests.description: Casting is the process of filling a mold with a metal and letting it harden into that shape. This will be our way of extracting material from the Smeltery.

tasks.longDescription: You can get a cast by putting an item in a Casting Table that is the inverse shape of the cast you want to make (In this example, most Ingot-shaped items), and then pour molten Aluminum Brass or molten Gold on it.

quests.name: Crooked
quests.description: What're you lookin' at?

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Crook.

quests.name: Bettered Mesh
quests.description: Your current mesh is simply not powerful enough to get more valuable resources out of blocks. Time to change that.

tasks.longDescription: Craft 3 Gravel together to make a piece of Flint. Make 6 of them.
Craft 6 Flint with a String Mesh to make a Flint Stiffened Mesh.

quests.name: Very Smashing
quests.description: Delicious!

tasks.longDescription: Break a compressed block and watch as the contents spill out.

quests.name: Quest Book Tutorial IV
quests.description: This type is a QDS Task. You must click "Select Task" and right click the Quest Delivery System to bind this quest to that QDS. Then, you can pipe in either items or fluids and they will go towards the completion of the quest. You can do this with regular Consume Tasks, too.

quests.name: Ultimate Mesh
quests.description: You can now make the ultimate mesh. The Diamond Stiffened Mesh. This will vastly increase the drop rates of any siftable items.

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Diamond Stiffened Mesh.

quests.name: Constructing
quests.description: These vanilla tools seem pretty weak... And you can barely customize them! Time to change that!

tasks.longDescription: Using your new tables, create Patterns for some of the basic tools.
Finally, it's time to use these patterns and make some tool parts!

quests.name: Getting Hot in Here
quests.description: The next step will be to build a processor capable of handling large amounts of ore. A Smeltery will do this job nicely.

tasks.longDescription: Craft a lot of Grout.
Cook it all into Seared Bricks.
Put together a Smeltery. You can use a Materials and You book to learn how if you do not know.

quests.name: Infestation
quests.description: See all those good-for-nothing Leaves? Time we make something out of them.

tasks.longDescription: Break Leaves with Crooks until a Silkworm drops.
Right click on any Leaves block and let time take its course as the Silkworm eats away the whole tree you planted it on. Then, when Leaves are fully converted, break with your Crook to get String.

quests.name: Basic Alloying
quests.description: Metal mixing is exciting!

tasks.longDescription: 3 Ingots Aluminum + 1 Ingot Copper = 4 Ingots Aluminum Brass. View the Casting quest to see how to remove ingots from Smeltery.
1 Ingot Silver + 1 Ingot Gold = 2 Ingots Electrum.
2 Ingots Iron + 1 Ingot Nickel = 3 Ingots Invar.
3 Ingots Copper + 1 Ingot Tin = 4 Ingots Bronze.

quests.name: Donkey Kong
quests.description: Get it?

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Wooden Barrel.
You can use Barrels to compost plant matter into Dirt, or to fill blocks like Dust with Water, turning them into Clay. Try it with 8 Saplings!
